events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund because the customer mentions requesting a refund for an incorrect item.
Agent John has been assigned to handle this refund request regarding the incorrect item delivery.
Hello! I’m John from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and want a refund. I’m here to help you resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received to assist with the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I’ve attached the photo showing the item I received, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method. You do not need to return the incorrect item. The refund should appear within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund being processed.
The refund request has been confirmed and processed on our end. Please check your account in a few days and contact us if you have any issues.
Just following up to confirm that you received the refund without any problems. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since no issues were reported after the follow-up, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
